name: Untitled roguelike game
description:
Untitled roguelike game is a 2D side-scroller roguelike action shooter game in which you control the gravity and has the ability to reverse it.

Game features:

Explore a random generated world with uniqe enemiesa and bosses (The current state of the game just has one boss but i will make more soon).

This game is still in development and may contain bugs, please report any bug if you find one, it will help with development. This is also one of my first "public" project (also the first time i drew pixel art so hope you like it :>) so i open to any feedbacks from you. Hope you have a great time!

This game support on Windows and I haven't tested it on Mac and Linux so recommend you play on Windows.

Control:

W, A, S, D to move.

Tab to show map.

Left mouse to shoot, scroll wheel to change weapons.

Space to flip gravity.

R to reload. Press R again at the right time to active reload.
